title: Shopify Frontend Developers
job_overview:
We are hiring for 4 Shopify Frontend Developers to join our team!

The company is dedicated to enhancing the performance of Shopify stores across a variety of markets. To support this initiative, we are on the lookout for a seasoned Frontend Developers with proven expertise in Shopify frontend development. This role will be instrumental in building responsive, high-performance web applications that enhance user experience and drive conversions.

We would love to hear from you ifâ€¦
- You have at least 1 year experience in Shopify front end development
- You have strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with experience in Shopify-specific frameworks and tools.
- Experience in UI/UX design is required.
- You have demonstrated experience with responsive design principles, particularly for creating promotional layouts that work effectively on various devices.
- You have excellent problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail
- You have strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with the team

Couple of the notes about the role
- This is not a salaried position. This is an Independent Contractor role.
- You must be able to commit at least 8 hours per day, 40 hours per week.
- We require everybody in the team to use Hubstaff (Upgrade to see actual info/) to track hours worked.

Compensation - EUR 7.4 ($8) per hour

Interview process: initial screening > HR interview > trial task > offer
